p: Cut-off values were determined as mean +3 standard deviations (SD) of PP values recorded in SA and SL IgG EBOV negative serum panels and also selected at 95% accuracy level by the misclassification cost term (MCT) option of the two-graph receiver operating characteristics (TG-ROC) analysis available from Microsoft Excel 2010 (Redmond, WA, USA) [ 43, 44] using SL reference IgG EBOV negative and positive serum panels. Coefficient of variation (CV) values were calculated to measure relative variability using the formula CV = (SD of replicates/mean of replicates) Ã— 100.
